texto: d) appropriate to the nature and size of the organization, its products and services, processes and activities; e) consistent with the strategy and objectives of the organization. 10.2.4 The organization should consider specific information relating to risks and opportunities when selecting KPIs. In addition, the organization should ensure that KPIs provide information to implement action plans when performance does not achieve the objectives, or to improve and innovate process efficiency and effectiveness.
